required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Comparative Study of Two Patterns of Controlled Ovarian Hyperstimulation in Mid Follicular Phase or Early Luteal Phase for Egg Donors
clinical_study.official_title: A Comparative Study of Two Patterns of Controlled Ovarian Hyperstimulation in Mid Follicular Phase or Early Luteal Phase for Egg Donors

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of two new patterns of controlled ovarian hyperstimulation (defined as total number of picked up eggs). This study will be performed in egg donors but these new patterns will be implemented in fertility preservation patients.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Participants will be followed after 1-3 hrs of follicular aspiration.
primary_outcome.description: The results will be presented in one year, egg recipients will be followed until 12 weeks of pregnancy.

arm_group.description: We perform an standard antagonist protocol beginning the second day of the menstrual cycle compared with an antagonist protocol beginning in the early luteal phase.
We perform an standard antagonist protocol beginning the second day of the menstrual cycle compared with an antagonist protocol beginning in the late follicular phase.

intervention.description: We will administer in the tenth day of the cycle 0.25mg/day of ganirelix until the estradiol levels will be less than 60pgr/mL. Then, we'll start a standard protocol of controlled ovarian hyperstimulation beginning with 150 UI/day. At 6th day of stimulation we'll begin with the antagonist.

We will administer in the 20th day of the cycle 0.25mg/day of ganirelix until the estradiol levels will be less than 60pgr/mL. Then, we'll start a standard protocol of controlled ovarian hyperstimulation beginning with 150 UI/day. At 6th day of stimulation we'll begin with the antagonist.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- premenopausal women 18-30 years old, with FSH levels < 10mIU
- irregular menstrual cycle
- BMI between 12-28
- signed inform consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Polycystic ovarian syndrome, gonadotropins allergy

facility.name: Servei de Ginecologia i Obstetricia, Hospital del Mar-Parc Salut Mar
